description: This source file defines an interface for subtitle extraction from video frames and provides a stub implementation simulating the extraction process for testing or placeholder purposes.

classes.name: SubtitleExtractor
classes.description: Interface defining methods for extracting subtitles from video frames and releasing resources.

classes.name: TFLiteSubtitleExtractorStub
classes.description: Stub implementation of SubtitleExtractor that simulates on-device inference behavior, providing placeholder subtitle text based on playback position.

methods.name: extractFromFrame
methods.description: Simulates extracting subtitles from a video frame at a given playback position, with placeholder logic.

methods.name: release
methods.description: Releases resources associated with the extractor. No operation in stub.
